scripts.start: dotnet fable watch src --run webpack serve
scripts.test: dotnet fable tests -o build/tests --run web-test-runner build/tests/*Test.js --node-resolve
scripts.test:watch: dotnet fable watch test -o build/test --run web-test-runner build/test/*Test.js --node-resolve --watch
scripts.start:tests: dotnet fable watch tests --run webpack serve --config webpack.config.tests.js
